message: I'm being fair, but I want most of the money. Let's get this over with!
Alice, that's not fair at all! I'm proposing a more balanced split. Take it before inflation eats away at your share!
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it this way. We're both losing money with each round, so let's be reasonable.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous! I'm taking another hit to meet you closer to the middle, but this is my final offer.  Accept it before inflation eats away even more of your share!
